content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. How much are you willing to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, the apartment is really nice. However, I am a student and I am on a tight budget. I am willing to pay 500 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, 500 Euros is a very low offer considering the location and the quality of the apartment. I'm sure you understand that I need to cover my costs and earn a reasonable profit. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understandable. However, I am a student and I have to consider my expenses. I am willing to pay 600 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 600 Euros is still below my expectations, but I appreciate your situation as a student. Would you be willing to negotiate further? Perhaps we can find a middle ground that works for both of us.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I can offer 650 Euros per month. I believe it is a fair price for a student like me.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 650 Euros is closer to my expectations, but I'm still hoping for a bit more. How about 700 Euros? This would be a fair deal for both parties, in my opinion.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month. I believe it is a fair price for a student like me.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month! Thank you for your understanding, Yi-Nuo. I'm looking forward to having you as a tenant. Please let me know if you have any questions or if there's anything else we need to discuss.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I have no more questions. I am glad we could come to an agreement. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
